name: The Bearing of the Cross (One of Twelve Plaques Depicting Scenes from the Passion of Christ)
description: The Bearing of the Cross (One of Twelve Plaques Depicting Scenes from the Passion of Christ); Jean II Pénicaud (French, about 1515 - about 1588); France; 1530s; Polychrome enamel on copper with gold highlights; 8.7 x 7.3 cm (3 7/16 x 2 7/8 in.); 88.SE.4.8; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
